d9e5130b-0c1d-49e8-9165-16c214c81438.description: The earner of this badge has demonstrated a profound interest in Celonis as a software as well as a company. The earner is able to put various terms into context such as: Process Mining, Execution Management System, and PQL.
d9e5130b-0c1d-49e8-9165-16c214c81438.name: Celonis Foundations

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the Celonis EMS Kickstarter course OR
Complete the Introduction to Process Mining course

185e15ce-a9b3-4231-b4aa-397505e1fb1e.description: The earner of this badge can discuss the role of Automation in business. They will have discussed Automation In General as well as its link to Process Mining technology. In addition to discussion different types and applications of Automation they will also have learned about software solutions in the field with a focus on Integromat by Celonis as well as Celonis Action Flows. They will have applied their knowledge in the form of an applied business case in the Integromast software.
185e15ce-a9b3-4231-b4aa-397505e1fb1e.name: Process Automation Bootcamp

badge_template_activities.title: Participate and actively engage in the Kickoff workshop as well as the final workshop.

f67bb3d4-75f9-4f23-8c28-5cc835fd01f4.description: The badge earner is able to describe and apply the science of Process Mining inside of Celonis Analyses. They can use the Celonis software to import and analyze process data and identify friction points.
f67bb3d4-75f9-4f23-8c28-5cc835fd01f4.name: Academic Process Mining Fundamentals

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the Training Track: Process Mining Fundamentals for Students

2cb05c22-2078-4a91-badb-e4d5105ee544.description: The Execution Management Consulting Program aims at providing students practical skills in the application of the Celonis Execution Management System. Based on a previous online training, students solve a case study (individually or in a group) and pitch their findings to a dedicated audience.
2cb05c22-2078-4a91-badb-e4d5105ee544.name: Execution Management Consulting Program for Students

badge_template_activities.title: Participate and actively engage in the kickoff workshop as well as the final workshop. Completion of online training to acquire necessary software skills. Completion of a business case that builds upon the online training. Involves the creation of an analysis in the Celonis software and the presentation of results. The presentation needs to be sent to the program coordinator via email before the final workshop.

fad9ae0d-5265-431e-9691-09e45b0e7090.description: The earner can conceptualize processes in terms of activities and cases. They can use the Variant Explorer for an overview of all the ways the process is flowing and the Process Explorer to quickly identify undesired activities and see how cases are flowing into and out of individual activities. They are able to verify assumptions about how the process is performing and to focus on attributes of cases reflecting inefficiency.
fad9ae0d-5265-431e-9691-09e45b0e7090.name: Review and Interpret Analyses

They know how to apply Design components such as lines, images, and a logo to enhance the visualization of the analysis. The earner can create custom KPIs using the formula builder in the Visual Editor and configure a Conformance checker sheet.

alignments.name: IEEE XES Standard
alignments.description: The goal of the eXtensible Event Stream (XES) Standard is to standardize a language to transport, store, and exchange (possibly large volumes of) event data (e.g., for process mining).

2010261e-cca9-4ad8-9138-7abe4bfb4ef7.description: The earner of this badge has successfully completed and passed a one-week Celonis Masterclass and has delivered a real-world implementation project comprising the following steps: Initiate to Implement, Implement, Adopt, Close & Final Executive Readout. Fullfill Case Study requirements.
Present findings and recommendations of Case Study to Celonis panel.
Prepare slides according to the guidelines thought during the Masterclass.
Demonstrate Value Delivery through findings and recommendations derived from the Case Study.
Demonstrate profound knowledge in setting up Data Connections and Celonis Analyses.
Only available to certified Celonis Partners.

b6db972b-5e1f-487e-8fac-082f7a82c61a.description: The earner of this badge has successfully completed and passed a one-week Celonis Masterclass and has delivered a real-world Proof-of-Value comprising the following steps: Discovery, Technical Prep, Measure & Know, Act & Impact, Final Presentation prep. and Execution. 46a008fd-76b9-4b63-b8f1-7bdd54365f12.description: This badge reflects the skills obtained through the Completion of a Celonis event in the 2022 Skill-a-thon season, which includes out bootcamp series, hack-a-thon events, and training seminars. ab5222bb-a265-41f8-bbc8-10d907af3f69.description: The earner of this badge has successfully completed and passed the Celonis Masterclass Coaches Enablement & Shadowing. 6359cf11-4278-415a-a939-4599f5b9d11c.description: The badge earner has participated in one or more phases of Celonis Certification Exam development, which may include helping define the scope of the skills and knowledge in the practitioner exam, development of exam items, and review of the technical accuracy of exam items.

ae8ae605-c4bd-45d2-bd61-06f082309161.description: The badge earner should be able to gather and understand business requirements, collaborate with stakeholders, and use Celonis Studio to create process analyses, apps, and automations that drive business improvements and generate value.
ae8ae605-c4bd-45d2-bd61-06f082309161.name: Celonis Certified Data Analyst

badge_template_activities.title: The earner of this badge has passed the Celonis Data Analyst - Associate Certification Exam. The Exam is intended for Celonis users with 6+ months of hands-on experience with Celonis Studio and at least 1 year of experience in a similar role.

5fc46236-9eeb-4b91-9144-203055064b24.description: The Celonis Academic Centers of Excellence are recognized as premier global hubs for applied education, curriculum development, and research around Process Mining. Global Centers of Excellence demonstrate leadership in the process mining community and the training of the next generation of process miners. Each institution was selected from a rigorous pool of applicants on a yearly basis, and represents the top 14 schools out of 500+ in the Celonis community.
5fc46236-9eeb-4b91-9144-203055064b24.name: Academic Center of Excellence 2021-22

badge_template_activities.title: Each Center of Excellence is required to submit an application detailing their plans for the upcoming schoolyear which include the implementation of process mining in direct education, curriculum, research, and community.
Each Center of Excellence demonstrates applying in-depth Process Mining education to their classrooms.
Each Center of Excellence demonstrates interest in furthering the process mining research community and pursuit of new and innovative research opportunities and/or case study creation.
Each Center of Excellence demonstrates an embodiment of the Celonis values in their community, such as "Earth is our Future" and "We own it".

42214b44-3b9f-4a14-ad7d-004558e3124c.description: The earner of this badge has successfully completed and passed the Celonis Masterclass enablement week. The earner has demonstrated to have knowledge on how to plan, set up and deliver Masterclass sessions. As a training professional, the earner is also able to conduct brief enablement sessions to internal resources. The earner of this badge can deliver the streams related to the specific Masterclass badges earned.
42214b44-3b9f-4a14-ad7d-004558e3124c.name: Masterclass Training Professional
